title: Must See!! Gorgeous 1 Bed on the Lake in Gold Coast!
posting_body: Come see this gorgeous one bedroom located on the border of Gold Coast and Old Town just steps from the Lake.
Priced to rent quickly this one bedroom is one of the best deals right now in the whole city for anyone looking for space and amenities in a luxury building.
The building has an amazing gym, rooftop overlooking lake and skyline, a grocery store and dry cleaner inside, business center, indoor parking garage, and even a dog park!
Maintenance on site and very responsive and friendly management.
Just north of the Magnificent Mile along the shores of Lake Michigan sits this beautiful property on Lake Shore Drive steps from the best of Chicago.
Affording easy access to the Lakefront Trail, Oak Street and North Avenue Beaches, world-renowned shopping, dining, and cultural attractions.
Expected to rent quickly please inquire for tours asap if you are interested!
